snippet: In the State of the Union address, Mr. Obama pointed to a way out of austerity and the stalemate on Capitol Hill.
abstract: Editorial praises Pres Obama's State of the Union address for pointing to a way out of austerity and stalemate on Capitol Hill; notes Obama's broad second-term agenda is impressive but says task before him is to turn widespread public support into a wedge to break Washington's gridlock.
lead_paragraph: In the State of the Union address, Mr. Obama pointed to a way out of austerity and the stalemate on Capitol Hill.

headline.seo: President Obama Challenges Congress in his State of the Union
